title: Natick Center Boutique Apartment
posting_body: This LIKE-NEW, floor-through condominium brings urban living to Downtown Natick!

Perfect for downsizers or city commuters, The Adams Carriage House offers a one-of-a-kind roof deck featuring an outdoor bar, built-in grill, flat screen tv, fire pit, sitting area, & panoramic views.
This 2 bed 2 bath unit offers over 1,300 SF of luxury living space across one level accessible by your own private, elevator.
Boasting 9’ ceilings & an open layout, entertaining is made easy across the living & dining areas.
The custom kitchen features BOSCH appliances, Calcutta quartz countertops, a built-in wine cooler, & two-tone cabinetry.
Your taste of an urban oasis wouldn't be complete without a large primary suite.
The en-suite Primary Bath has a double vanity & large rain shower with a stone pebble floor.
A generous second bedroom, full bath, in-unit laundry, & garage parking complete this truly unique condo that is no FOR RENT!
First, Security and one month broker fee due at lease signing.
Great Credit, Income & References are a must.
